Bridging the gap between technology and the business of law.

Hi, Iâ€™m Auran, a full-stack web developer and aspiring lawyer. Starting off as an economics major then law student, I ended up falling in love with coding. After witnessing the astounding gap between legal operations and technology in an era where tech is all the rage, I dove into the world of coding and discovered my passion. This motivated me to want to explore opportunities for innovation and improvement in the legal and business industries through technology, and solve business problems from a legal perspective, m the law an easier way of life for people.

Legal Research & Analysis

Graduated from Fordham Law in Feb 2017; worked at both boutique and international firms in the areas of privacy, compliance, and intellectual property.

Portfolio

JPilgrim

A fully-responsive, multi-page static HTML5 site that provides resources and helpful guides to those walking or interested in the Shikoku Pilgrimage.
CharityBlend

A fully-responsive, multi-page static HTML5 site that provides resources and helpful guides to those walking or interested in the Shikoku Pilgrimage.
World Recipes

A Rails-Angular App that displays recipes and allows users to create recipes or add existing recipes to their favorites. The app runs on Rails 5.0 and uses PostgreSQL for the database.
Oovart's Planet Shop at the End of the Universe

A full-fledged Rails application with a jQuery frontend that allows users to create accounts or sign in with Facebook, and create new planets with various preexisting or customized features.
Zookeeper

A Sinatra CRUD application that allows users to sign up as zookeepers, customize their own zoo, and purchase food to take care of their favorite animals.
Tokyo Events CLI Gem

A Ruby gem that scrapes web data and returns information on current and upcoming events in Tokyo.
